source:
%%sql

SELECT 
    T2.EmployeeNumber,
    T2.FirstName,
    T2.LastName,
    T2.Gender,
    T2.DOB,
    T2.AddressLine1,
    T2.AddressLine2,
    T2.City,
    T2.County,
    T2.Postcode,
    T2.EmailAddress,
    T2.TelePhoneNumberWork,
    T2.CivilServiceStart,
    T3.ContractCode,
    T3.Description as ContractCodeDesc,
    T3.ContractTypeCode,
    T3.ContractType as ContractTypeCodeDesc,
    T2.DateToCurrentJob,
    T2.EmailAddress,
    T2.EmploymentGroup,
    T2.EmploymentStatus,
    T2.FixTermEndDate,
    T2.FTE,
    T2.PartTimeEmployee,
    T2.LoanStartDate,
    T2.LoanEndDate,
    T4.LocationCode,
    T4.Description as LocationCodeDesc,
    T5.EmployeeNumber as ManagerEmployeeNumber,
    T5.FirstName AS ManagerFirstName,
    T5.LastName AS ManagerLastName,
    T6.PositionCode as ManagerPositionCode,
    T6.Description as ManagerPositionCodeDesc



FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T2 ON T1.EmployeeID = T2.EmployeeID and T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.contract_dim T3 ON T1.ContractID = T3.ContractID and T3.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.pins_location_dim T4 ON T1.LocationID = T4.LocationID and T4.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_hr_hierarchy_dim T5 ON T1.EmployeeID = T5.EmployeeID and T5.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T6 ON T5.ManagerEmployeeID = T6.EmployeeID
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.position_dim T7 ON T6.PositionID = T7.PositionID
WHERE T1.IsActive = 'Y'
